author: cms-sw
body:
- Generate comparison baseline on demand.
  - This avoids the need of generating baseline for all releases
  - Now we only generate baseline when any pull request needs it
  - First PR to request it will generate the baseline other pull requests will only use it.
  - Now PR tests can make use of latest IB as soon as it is available on cvmfs (previously we have to wait for baseline to be available too).
- Generate comparison baseline for extra workworks requested via pull request
- Support high_stats relvals and comparison (currently wf 35034.0 with 1000 events)
- Fixes the DQM bin-by-bin comparison to upload each comparison  under  a different tag
title: Generate baseline for IB when needed
